00273     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type*,
00274     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_signed<T> >::type*)
00275 {
00276     try {
00277         _set_signed(n);
00278     } catch (std::exception&) {
00279         _base_attach(0);
00280     }

00310 template <typename T>
00311 T to(const nothrow_integer& n) {

00313         return detail::to<T>(n);

00321 template <typename charT, typename traits>
00322 inline std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>& operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT,
00323     traits>& out, const nothrow_integer& n)
00324 {
00325     if (n.is_nan()) {
00326         out << detail::nan_text;
00327         return out;
00328     } else {
00329         return detail::operator<<(out, n);
00330     }
00331 }
00332 
00333 template <typename charT, typename traits>
00334 inline std::basic_istream<charT,traits>& operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT,
00335     traits>& in, nothrow_integer& n)
00336 {
00337     if (in.peek()=='#') {
00338         // Must be either #NaN# or an error
00339         char buffer[6];
00340 
00341         // These are efficient and safe, but MSVC complains about them anyway.
00342         //std::streamsize size=in.readsome(buffer, 5);
00343         //buffer[size]=0;
00344 
00345         // Replacing them with these.
00346         char *p = buffer, *pe = p + 5;
00347         while (p != pe) in >> *p++;
00348         *p = 0;
00349 
00350         std::string str(buffer);
00351 
00352         if (str==detail::nan_text) n=nothrow_integer::nan();
00353         else in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
00354         return in;
00355     } else {
00356         return detail::operator>>(in, n);
00357     }
00358 }
00360 
00362 template <class T>
00363 nothrow_integer nothrow_random_by_size(T& gen, size_t bits, bool high_bit_on,
00364     bool low_bit_on, bool can_be_negative)
00365 {
00366     try {
00367         return nothrow_integer(xint::random_by_size(gen, bits, high_bit_on,
00368             low_bit_on, can_be_negative));
00369     } catch (std::exception&) {
00370         return nothrow_integer::nan();
00371     }
00372 }
00373 
00375 template <class T>
00376 nothrow_integer nothrow_random_prime(T& gen, size_t size_in_bits, callback_t
00377     callback)
00378 {
00379     try {
00380         nothrow_integer r(xint::random_prime(gen, size_in_bits, callback));
00381         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00382     } catch (std::exception&) {
00383         return nothrow_integer::nan();
00384     }
00385 }
00386 
00387 inline void swap(nothrow_integer& left, nothrow_integer& right) {
00388     left._swap(right);
00389 }
